name: Sensitive Nose
summary: Your large black nose isn't just for show.
description:
Your large black nose isn't just for show. You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet.

Special You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you canâ€™t retrain out of this feat or into this feat.Traits
